backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, attachments, booking status, and exposes authorized APIs for managing profiles and uploading or fetching attachments using access control and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function converting old flat user profiles into new customer/driver variant profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their responsibilities across UI, pages, hooks, and components.
frontend/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying shared UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router with all site routes and wraps the application in the ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access denied alert with an admin login button for unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/AuthRequiredScre: Shows an authentication-required card prompting users to log in to access protected pages.
frontend/src/components/forms/FieldError: Shows a small error message with an icon for form fields.
frontend/src/components/forms/StarRating: Interactive 1–5 star rating input with hover effects, keyboard support, and optional clearing.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with visual states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts newly authenticated users without profiles to enter and save their name using profile API hooks.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, and business contact details.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Displays the site header with navigation, login/profile/admin controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Wraps the page layout with header, footer, and main content outlet including profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/content/businessInfo.ts: Exports static business contact and service information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminGuard.ts: Checks authentication and queries whether the current caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttachments.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and upload user attachments using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile and includes a helper to extract display names.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, login, persistence, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides booking-related queries and mutations including list, fetch by ID, and submit.
frontend/src/hooks/useRateCard.ts: Fetches and updates the backend rate card using react‑query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useReferral.ts: Provides React Query hooks to generate, fetch, apply referral codes and fetch referral bonuses via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes with an earthy color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections for hero content, company story, values, and mission using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminBookingsPa: Admin interface to view bookings, manage rate cards, and handle authentication/authorization checks.
frontend/src/pages/BookCabPage.tsx: Implements a cab booking form with validation, state management, rating inputs, and submission via a booking mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays business contact information using cards for phone, helpline, email, service area, and hours.
frontend/src/pages/FaqPage.tsx: Shows a list of frequently asked questions using an accordion component for expandable answers.
frontend/src/pages/FleetPage.tsx: Displays a fleet list with vehicle details and renders a grid of cards showing capacity, luggage, features, and ideal uses.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero, features, and CTAs, using navigation to booking and services pages.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Shows pricing ranges, factors, inclusions, and exclusions with explanatory cards and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page handling identity, profile saving, referral codes, and attachment uploads.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders a grid of service offerings with icons, descriptions, and feature lists, plus a hero and CTA section.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders a testimonials page showing customer reviews in a card grid with a hero and CTA section.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallbacks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining themes, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing features, pending feature requests, and architectural notes.
